abstract: Fox Sports names Hall of Fame pitcher John Smoltz as lead baseball analyst; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame pitcher, who has previously called games for Fox and MLB Network, will replace Harold Reynolds and Tom Verducci.

headline.main: John Smoltz Named Lead Baseball Analyst for Fox
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Baseball; Fox Hires Smoltz as Lead Analyst

snippet: The Hall of Fame pitcher, who has previously called games for Fox and MLB Network, will replace Harold Reynolds and Tom Verducci.
